<p> Color node defines a set of RGB color values that apply either to a sibling Coordinate|CoordinateDouble node, or else to a parent ElevationGrid node. Color is only used by ElevationGrid, IndexedFaceSet, IndexedLineSet, LineSet, PointSet, Triangle* and IndexedTriangle* nodes. <i>Hint:</i> colors are often controlled by Material instead. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#Color" target="_blank">Color</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html" target="_blank">11 Rendering component,</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html#Concepts" target="_blank">11.2 Concepts</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html#ColorConcept" target="_blank">11.2.2.2 Geometric properties: Color concepts</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html#X3DColorNode" target="_blank">11.3.1 X3DColorNode</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/rendering.html#Color" target="_blank">11.4.2 Color</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter16Color" target="_blank">Chapter 16 Color</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter06GeometryPointsLinesPolygons" target="_blank">Chapter 06 Geometry Points Lines Polygons</a> </li> </ul>
